title: Client issue and game losses
body: Its not fair that if my client crashes on its own, i get a game loss and i have to wait 30 minutes to play. that is very frustrating. I picked my champion, was waiting for the game to start, and my client bugs out, freezes, and stops responding automatically closing it out. Is there any way to reverse the game loss? why is this even a thing?

replies.body: Did you receive any error message or window when the client crashed? This could point us in the right direction as to what's causing this issue.

Try the repair thing on ingame log in screen. Or uninstall game an redownloading load it. Should only take 10-20mins 
The more ppl running things on your internet will make it run worse.
